inclusion.criterion: Able to adhere to the study visit schedule and other protocol requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status(KPS) ≥50（KPS<50 will be allowed if related to bony disease）
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association(NYHA) functional ≤class III
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensitivity to clarithromycin or any of its excipients, erythromycin, or any of the macrolide antibiotics;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant administration of cisapride, pimozide, astemizole, terfenadine, ergotamine or dihydroergotamine, simvastatin, lovastatin, and atorvastatin;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: A history of cholestatic jaundice/hepatic dysfunction associated with prior use of clarithromycin.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any condition which places the subject at unacceptable risk if he/she were to participate in the study or confounds the ability to interpret data from the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including melphalan, prednisone, VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
